main event: A bright object was observed in the sky over Benton, Pennsylvania, followed by a brilliant explosion at a very high altitude.
interesting points: The object appeared the size of a dime held at arm's length., The incident included a white vapor trail and slight glow., Observers noted a slight downward path from northwest to southeast., The sighting lasted only a few seconds., The object's behavior was described as higher than normal for aircraft.
witness description: Air visual crew consisting of five Allegheny pilots.
